description: To provide Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation and supervision required to perform maintenance, repairs, replacement of parts or systems with new install for overhead doors and associated equipment, automatic doors, rolling gates and grilles located at various locations of CFB Halifax and outlying areas.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Overhead Doors Maintenance
#### Saskatchewan, Canada

**Reference:** WS3980941483-Doc3993080435

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit offers for the maintenance, replacement, and installation of overhead doors and associated equipment at various locations within CFB Halifax (Canada).

#### Tender Details

| **Attribute** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Reference** | WS3980941483-Doc3993080435 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3980941483 |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-05-26 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-06-21T14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2023-06-01 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | One-year contract with options for four additional one-year periods |

#### Description
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking offers to provide the necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, and supervision for the required maintenance, repairs, and replacement of parts or systems for overhead doors and associated equipment. The contractor will be responsible for fulfilling the requirements outlined in the tender document.

#### Eligibility Requirements
* Offerors must be registered and compliant with relevant trade agreements and regulations.
* Offerors must provide proof of qualifications and expertise in maintaining and repairing overhead doors and associated equipment.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be awarded based on the lowest price.

#### Inquiries
All technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, Kate Mintzer, at kate.mintzer@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.

#### Proposed Plan
The contract will be executed in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender document.

#### Supporting Documents
The notice URL is available at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16402554?extsite=MTY0MDI1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Additional Details
Contractors are advised to review the tender document for additional requirements and requirements prior to submitting their offers.
---

Note that the contact information for Kate Mintzer has been removed to respect privacy. Please do not use Kate's contact information for inquiries or other purposes.  Thank you.
